location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Lockyer Merewether, Kurrachee [Karachi] to Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Letter regarding Pelly's illness whilst visiting Muscat, and expressing Merewether's regret that Pelly could not come to Kurrachee [Karachi] to rest and recover there.The letter also discusses the recent death of [Sidney?] Smith, who had been serving as an Assistant to Pelly in the Persian Gulf; a rebellion taking place in northern Beloochistan [Baluchistan]; and Frederic Goldsmid having departed England for Bunder Abbass [Bandar Abbas] in order to continue his work on the Seistan [Sīstān] boundary issue.
